name: CHESTER-UPLAND SCHOOL DISTRICT SPECIAL BOARD OF CONTROL, Michael F.X. Gillin, and Wallace H. Nunn, Appellants v. Edward G. RENDELL, Gerald L. Zahorchak, C. Marc Woolley, Juan Baugh, and Katherine Schultz, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Chester-Upland School District Special Board of Control v. Rendell

parties: CHESTER-UPLAND SCHOOL DISTRICT SPECIAL BOARD OF CONTROL, Michael F.X. Gillin, and Wallace H. Nunn, Appellants v. Edward G. RENDELL, Gerald L. Zahorchak, C. Marc Woolley, Juan Baugh, and Katherine Schultz, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of May, 2008, the Notice of Appeal is denied. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Education v. Empowerment Board of Control of the Chester-Upland, School District, 595 Pa. 426, 938 A.2d 1000 (2007).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
952 A.2d 1164
CHESTER-UPLAND SCHOOL DISTRICT SPECIAL BOARD OF CONTROL, Michael F.X. Gillin, and Wallace H. Nunn, Appellants v. Edward G. RENDELL, Gerald L. Zahorchak, C. Marc Woolley, Juan Baugh, and Katherine Schultz, Appellees.
No. 17 MAP 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 16, 2008.
